register.subtitle: Get started with MultiSaasWeb and create amazing chatbots
register.heroDescription: Be part of the new era of intelligent chatbots and transform how your business communicates with customers.
register.termsMessage: By creating an account, you agree to our

success.title: Account Created!
success.message: Your account has been created successfully. You can now log in and start creating your chatbots.

errors.emailTaken: This email is already in use
errors.domainBlocked: This email domain is not allowed
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

password.minLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
password.minLengthRegister: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.complexity: Password must contain uppercase, lowercase, and number

errors.serverError: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.tooManyAttempts: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link
resetPassword.heroDescription: Reset your password securely with our simple and reliable recovery process.

success.title: Email Sent!
success.message: We've sent a reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox.

errors.emailNotFound: No account found with this email address
errors.accountBlocked: This account has been temporarily blocked
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.

renewPassword.title: New Password
renewPassword.subtitle: Choose a strong new password to secure your account
renewPassword.heroDescription: Create a strong and unique password to protect your account and data.

success.title: Password Updated!
success.message: Your password has been successfully updated. You will be redirected to login.

errors.tokenInvalid: Reset link is no longer valid
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.

activateAccount.title: Activate Account
activateAccount.subtitle: Enter or paste the activation token sent to your email

success.title: Account Activated!
success.message: Your account has been successfully activated. You can now log in and start using MultiSaasWeb.

errors.tokenExpired: Activation token has expired. Please request a new link.
errors.tokenInvalid: Invalid activation token. Please check the code.
errors.tokenAlreadyUsed: This account has already been activated.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
